sys_metadata_link.payload:
true
During the diagnosis process, support teams can find critical information by analyzing:

  • Other incidents created for the caller.
  • Different tasks affecting the configuration item and business service, for example, known errors and open change requests.

Support teams can identify related tasks by using:

  • Show related incidents icon 
  • Related Incidents list
  • Business Services Map
  • Other active tasks icon 
]]>
